about.title: About Us
about.text1: I am Laura Forero, an entrepreneur and public relations professional passionate about building communities and strengthening ecosystems for startups, VC funds, and public or private entities in Colombia and LATAM.
about.text2: With over 9 years of experience in public relations, free press, high-impact event production, communication strategies and high-impact programs, I have learned to deeply understand the needs of the tech sector and take brands to the next level.
about.text3: I am co-founder of Colombia Tech Week and an active leader at Wondertech Latam.

lensPRInfo.title: More about LENS PR
lensPRInfo.paragraph1: LENS PR is a boutique public relations agency specialized in the tech sector with operations in over 10 countries in LATAM, the US, and Spain. We connect founders, startups, and VC funds with their audiences or clients through tailor-made press, communication, high-level events, and strategic alliances.
lensPRInfo.paragraph2: With over 400 publications for our clients and more than 50 tailor-made events, we have established ourselves as key players in the tech ecosystem in Colombia and LATAM.
lensPRInfo.paragraph3: Global companies such as DEEL, Blackrock, Forbes-promising startups like Yuno and Celes, and notable VCs like FEMSA Ventures, Newtopia VC, Latitud, as well as the most important local ecosystem event, Colombia Tech Week, have trusted us.

services.description: With over 400 publications for our clients and more than 50 tailor-made events, we have established ourselves as key players in the tech ecosystem in Colombia and LATAM. Global companies like DEEL, Blackrock, Forbes-promising startups such as Yuno and Celes, notable VCs like FEMSA Ventures, Newtopia VC, Latitud, and Colombia Tech Week, the most important local event, have trusted us.

hero.title: Press & Events
hero.subtitle: Startups | Big Tech | Venture Capital | Finance

paragraph.text: We are a public relations firm passionate about the Latino and global tech ecosystem. We connect startups, companies and global financiers with their audiences through events, experiences and press in more than 12 countries in Latin America, United States and Europe.

credibilityStats.title: With a global perspective
credibilityStats.subtitle: International brands around the world trust us to deliver results.
credibilityStats.brandsDescription: Over the past 3 years, we have collaborated with over 50 local and global brands.
credibilityStats.countriesDescription: Working across many markets has built our international expertise.
credibilityStats.eventsDescription: Our experiences leveled up brands and their key audiences across LATAM.
credibilityStats.publicationsDescription: We tell stories. Our clients have the content, we publish it.

galleryItems.designContentDescription: We craft compelling stories for luxury hotels, resorts, and restaurants to engage customers with strategic media placements and experiences.
galleryItems.freePressDescription: Showcasing breathtaking locations with experiential campaigns, influencer outreach, and immersive media coverage.

galleryItems.fundPositioningTitle: POSITIONING FOR VC FUNDS AND STARTUPS
galleryItems.fundPositioningDescription: We build strategic narratives to attract investors, build trust, and stand out in the industry.
galleryItems.financialInnovationForumsAndSummitsDescr: We organize high-level spaces where leaders from the technology and financial sectors can connect and create new opportunities.
galleryItems.strategicAlliancesAndHighImpactNetworkin: We facilitate key connections between startups, corporations, and investors, accelerating growth and global expansion.

leftColumn.description: With over 400 publications for our clients and more than 50 tailor-made events, we have established ourselves as key players in the tech ecosystem in Colombia and LATAM. Global companies like DEEL, Blackrock, Forbes-promising startups such as Yuno and Celes, notable VCs like FEMSA Ventures, Newtopia VC, Latitud, and Colombia Tech Week, the most important local event, have trusted us.
leftColumn.corporateEventsDescription: We design innovative experiences to strengthen the connection between your brand and its audience, creating memorable moments that drive engagement and loyalty. From exclusive product launches and corporate anniversaries to team-building activities and VIP networking events, we ensure every detail reflects your brand's values and objectives, leaving a lasting impression on attendees.
leftColumn.tailorMadeProyectsDescription: We specialize in creating unique and impactful events and projects, meticulously tailored to meet your specific needs and objectives. From concept to execution, we ensure a seamless and effective experience, crafting memorable moments that resonate with your audience and drive tangible results.
